## Connection.getFeeCalculatorForBlockhash() method

Fetch the fee calculator for a recent blockhash from the cluster, return with context

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFeeCalculatorForBlockhash(blockhash: Blockhash, commitment?: Commitment): Promise<RpcResponseAndContext<FeeCalculator | null>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockhash | Blockhash | query blockhash as a Base58 encoded string |
|  commitment | [Commitment](./web3.js.commitment.md) | optional commitment level, defaults to class commitment level |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[RpcResponseAndContext](./web3.js.rpcresponseandcontext.md)<!-- -->&lt;FeeCalculator \| null&gt;&gt;
